survey_name: Employee Experience with AI-Powered Workplace Assistants Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the adoption and effectiveness of AI-powered workplace assistants in enhancing employee productivity and satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the AI-powered workplace assistant in your daily tasks?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the AI-powered workplace assistant in your daily tasks?

questions.question_text: Which of the following tasks do you use the AI-powered workplace assistant for? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an open-ended option for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following tasks do you use the AI-powered workplace assistant for? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered workplace assistant's performance?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-powered workplace assistant's performance?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered workplace assistant?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered workplace assistant?

questions.question_text: Has the AI-powered workplace assistant improved your productivity?
answer_options: No, it has decreased my productivity
